line.comment: * No checks are done here. See Mayhem.Mission.Generate.
* Mordan8 - some variability to duration of missions.
* Warning: the script can return null in the following routine.
* Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode spawns more enemy ships.
* Artificially add some ships for player to buy. A bit cheaty, but provides better user-experience.
* Easier difficulties = less expensive. Add-Ons 1.3: ships bought under an insane difficulty acquisition are 28% more expensive compared to hard.
* Do not select the same sector twice.
* In Mayhem.Mission.Callback, we create $asteroids asteroids only if those already in the sector are NOT scanned.
* Do not select the same sector twice.
* $stolenShip is taken from the random pool of suspects that the player has to scan.

sval.val: No checks are done here. See Mayhem.Mission.Generate.
Mordan8 - some variability to duration of missions.
Warning: the script can return null in the following routine.
Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode spawns more enemy ships.
Artificially add some ships for player to buy. A bit cheaty, but provides better user-experience.
Easier difficulties = less expensive. Add-Ons 1.3: ships bought under an insane difficulty acquisition are 28% more expensive compared to hard.
Do not select the same sector twice.
In Mayhem.Mission.Callback, we create $asteroids asteroids only if those already in the sector are NOT scanned.
Do not select the same sector twice.
$stolenShip is taken from the random pool of suspects that the player has to scan.
